nodes.text: Star Wars: Lives & Adventures is a Disney eBook that republishes four young readers stories by author Ryder Windham under the Star Wars Legends banner. The collected stories include The Life and Legend of Obi-Wan Kenobi, A New Hope: The Life of Luke Skywalker, The Wrath of Darth Maul, and The Rise and Fall of Darth Vader. It was released on May 4, 2014.

Want to learn more about the most notorious Jedi and Sith from the Star Wars universe? This eBook collation of The Life and Legend of Obi-Wan Kenobi, A New Hope: The Life of Luke Skywalker, The Wrath of Darth Maul, and The Rise and Fall of Darth Vader will show you give you an in-depth look at these legendary characters.
